channel.title: This American Life Archive
channel.description: Autogenerated feed of the This American Life archive.

item.title: 867: College Disorientation
item.description: Things are different on college campuses this year. We see inside the drama, with students and staff.

item.title: 866: Watch Out for That Tree
item.description: Small human plans that run into much larger obstacles.

item.title: 233: Starting From Scratch
item.description: A man in retirement tries to start over in a new life with a new venture: a cable channel, with lots of puppies.

item.title: 865: The Other Territory
item.description: Since October 7, Israel has intensified restrictions on West Bank Palestinians while global attention focused on Gaza. We travel to the West Bank to see these changes in person.

item.title: 864: Chicago Hope
item.description: The story of the most commonly performed surgery, and what goes terribly wrong with it.
